    Card tag

    Headline that goes onto a second or third line

    6 hours ago

A Page Hero with Image

This page demonstrates mixing different container sizes on a single page. This hero component is in an extra large container, mzp-t-content-xl. It also has a full-bleed background.

Call to action

A headline with 30 characters

These two feature cards are in a medium container, .mzp-t-content-md. The row of cards below is in a large container, .mzp-t-content-lg.
